definition: A term commonly employed to express a physical sensation or emotional state caused by external pressure or internal stress. It is often used to describe a feeling of heaviness, tightness, or discomfort, typically experienced in the chest or other parts of the body. This word is frequently utilized in contexts related to mental health, stress, or physical strain.
